title: #14 - That Episode Where They Talk Politics and Dating with Charlotte Clymer
description:
This week’s guest is truly a wordsmith. Not only does her articles resonate and make you think, her tweets go viral all the time. Just recently, Hillary Clinton even retweeted her!!!

What can we learn about the power of our words to build relationships with others, even getting that first date?

Charlotte Clymer is a writer and LGBTQ advocate. She recently finished a tour as the press secretary for rapid response at the Human Rights Campaign, the nation's largest LGBTQ civil rights organization. Currently, she is working on her first book, soon-to-be announced.

Find Charlotte on Twitter

Find Charlotte on Instagram 

Follow Maria on Instagram

 Have a question for Maria? Visit http://askamatchmaker.com

Join our Facebook group to be part of the ongoing dating conversation. 

To learn more about how Maria and how her team can help you find love, visit agapematch.com
author: maria@agapematch.com (Maria Avgitidis)
